background_image_description: Full-canvas cosmic purple gradient background with subtle nebula textures and starry flares. Radial/linear blend from deep violet #1A0433 (top-left) through rich purple #4B138C to bright magenta-violet #6B1FB2 and dark plum #340A66 (bottom-right). Soft darker vignette at edges and faint pinkish clouds around the center-right.

nodes.asset_description: Right-side composite: a large vertical black-framed smartphone with rounded corners (bezel nearly black #0E0E12, small centered camera hole). Screen shows a pale blue gradient (#DFF1FF to #A9CCF3). A smiling man with medium complexion and locs, wearing a light blue sweatshirt and dark pants, sits cross‑legged in front of the phone, giving two thumbs up, with a silver laptop on his lap. Soft white vapor clouds escape from the phone edges. Floating 3D social elements surround: a red/white like/heart bubble on the far right, a blue share-arrow bubble near lower right, a yellow face with heart eyes near center-left, and a surprised emoji near lower right. Overall soft shadow under the phone.

Footer bar: wide rounded rectangle spanning near the bottom with dark translucent purple fill (#3A1A57) and slight inner gradient, containing small white phone icon on the left and vertical dividers between sections.
Rounded rectangle CTA button background filled mustard yellow #FFC72E with soft drop shadow.
Minimal white geometric brand mark resembling a stylized house/monogram icon.

nodes.text: Super fast support and real time updates wherever you are.
